    ?item p:P528 ?seq_stmt .
    ?seq_stmt ps:P528 ?seq .
    ?seq_stmt pq:P972 wd:Q68810696 .

    ?adm_stmt ps:P131 ?council .

    ?adm_stmt2 pq:P582 ?d2

    ?adm_stmt2 ps:P131 ?county .

query:
# most recently dissolved enterprises that were over 200 years old
SELECT ?company ?companyLabel ?founded ?dissolved (xsd:integer((?dissolved - ?founded)/365.2425) AS ?years) WHERE {
  ?company wdt:P1454/wdt:P279* wd:Q6881511; # the instance/subclass tree for companies seems to be a bit messy, so go via “legal form” instead
           wdt:P571 ?founded;
           wdt:P576 ?dissolved.
  FILTER(?founded < (NOW() - "P200Y"^^xsd:duration))
  FILTER(?dissolved > (?founded + "P200Y"^^xsd:duration))
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en,de". } # final fallback to German because as of 2019-09-26, many results were German(-language) companies
}
ORDER BY DESC(?dissolved)
LIMIT 25
context: Most recently dissolved enterprises that were over 200 years old

query:
# Cumulative count of items with the given name at a milestone
# adapted by Jura1 from a query by 99of9, February 2020, [[Wikidata:Request_a_query/Archive/2019/06#dateCreated_instead_of_dateModified?]]
#
#defaultView:LineChart
SELECT (SAMPLE(?date) AS ?date) (SUM(?count) AS ?cumulative_count) ?milestone
{

  { SELECT ?qid_rounded (count(?item) AS ?count) WHERE {
      ?item wdt:P735 wd:Q4925477 .
      BIND( xsd:integer( substr(str(?item), 33)) as ?qid)
      BIND(xsd:integer(?qid/50000) as ?qid_cut)
      BIND(?qid_cut*50000 as ?qid_rounded)
    }
    GROUP BY ?qid_rounded
  }
  wd:Q38074555 p:P1114 ?milestonep .
  ?milestonep ps:P1114 ?milestone .
  FILTER(?milestone > ?qid_rounded) .
  ?milestonep pq:P585 ?date .
}
GROUP BY ?milestone

query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?itemLabel ?start ?end ?child ?childLabel (MAX(?child_dob) AS ?child_dob1) (MIN(?child_age) AS ?child_age1) WHERE {
  ?item p:P39 ?pm_stmt .
  ?pm_stmt ps:P39 wd:Q14211 .
  ?pm_stmt pq:P580 ?start .
  OPTIONAL {?pm_stmt pq:P582 ?end} .
  
  ?item wdt:P40 ?child .
  ?child wdt:P569 ?child_dob .
  FILTER(! (?child_dob > ?end)) .
  BIND (((?start - ?child_dob) / 365.24) AS ?child_age) .
  FILTER (?child_age < 5) 
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
      ?child wdt:P570 ?child_dod . 
      FILTER (?child_dod < ?start) .
  }
  
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
} GROUP BY ?item ?itemLabel ?start ?end ?child ?childLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?start) ?child_dob1
context: British Prime Ministers with children under the age of 5 when elected, or born during their time in office

query:
#Timeline of countries of origin of the winner of the European Film Award for Best European Film
#defaultView:BarChart
SELECT ?countryLabel (STR(YEAR(?date)) AS ?year) ?title WHERE {
    #getting award winners for each year
    ?item p:P166 ?st1; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424. ?st1 ps:P166 wd:Q777921; pq:P585 ?date.  
    #making sure the statement is sourced with a page from the domain "www.europeanfilmacademy.org"
    ?st1 prov:wasDerivedFrom ?ref1. 
    ?ref1 pr:P854 ?url1. FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?url1), "www.europeanfilmacademy.org"))
    #getting country of origin                                    
    ?item p:P495 ?st2.
    #making sure the country of origin is sourced with a page from the domain "www.europeanfilmawards.eu"
    ?st2 ps:P495 ?country; prov:wasDerivedFrom ?ref2. 
    ?ref2 pr:P854 ?url2. FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?url2), "www.europeanfilmawards.eu"))
    #getting the titles
    ?item wdt:P1476 ?orig_title; rdfs:label ?label. FILTER(LANG(?label)="en")
    BIND(IF(LANG(?orig_title) IN ("en", "en-gb", "en-us") || STR(?orig_title)=STR(?label), ?orig_title, CONCAT(?orig_title, " (", ?label, ")")) AS ?title)
    SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
ORDER BY ?year ?countryLabel
context: Timeline of countries of origin of the winner of the European Film Award for Best European Film

query:
#defaultView:Graph
SELECT
  ?topic1 ?topic1Label ?topic2 ?topic2Label
WITH {
  SELECT
    (COUNT(?work) AS ?count) ?topic1 ?topic2
  WHERE {
    # Find works that are marked with main subject of the topic.
    ?work wdt:P921 / ( wdt:P31*/wdt:P279* | wdt:P361+ | wdt:P1269+ ) wd:Q82069695 .
    
    # Identify co-occuring topics. 
    ?work wdt:P921 ?topic1, ?topic2 . 

    # Exclude the topic it self
    FILTER (wd:Q82069695 != ?topic1 && wd:Q82069695 != ?topic2 && ?topic1 != ?topic2)
  }
  GROUP BY ?topic1 ?topic2
  ORDER BY DESC(?count)

  # There a performance problems in the browser: We cannot show large graphs,
  # so we put a limit on the number of links displayed.
  LIMIT 400

} AS %results
WHERE {
  INCLUDE %results
  
  # Label the results
  SERVICE wikibase:label {
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en,da,de,es,fr,jp,nl,no,ru,sv,zh".
  }
}

  ?q1 wdt:P31 wd:Q484170 ; rdfs:label ?label ; wdt:P625 ?coord1 . FILTER (lang(?label) = "fr").

  ?q2 p:P625/psv:P625 ?valuenode2. ?valuenode2 wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat2 . ?valuenode2 wikibase:geoLongitude ?lon2.
  FILTER ( str(?q1) > str(?q2) )
  BIND(geof:distance(?coord1, ?coord2) AS ?dist).
  BIND(floor(?dist/100) AS ?layer).
  BIND(CONCAT('LINESTRING (', STR(?lon1), ' ', STR(?lat1), ',', STR(?lon2), ' ', STR(?lat2), ')') AS ?str) .
  BIND(STRDT(?str, geo:wktLiteral) AS ?line)
  FILTER ( ?dist > 100 )
}
LIMIT 100

{
  ?l a ontolex:LexicalEntry ; dct:language ?language ; wikibase:lemma ?hitza ; ontolex:sense ?esanahia.
  ?esanahia skos:definition ?sense; wdt:P5137 ?q_concept.
  ?q_concept wdt:P18 ?picture_.
  ?language wdt:P218 'eu'.

  OPTIONAL {?l wdt:P6838 ?elhuyar.}
  ?l ontolex:lexicalForm ?f .
  ?f ontolex:representation ?form ; wdt:P443 ?audio .
  filter (regex(str(?f), "-F1$")) .
    # Exclude out of scope concepts
  MINUS {?q_concept wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078.}. # countries
  MINUS {?l wdt:P31 wd:Q1499602.}. #ad hoc hitzak
  # Exclude non suitable concepts
  VALUES ?minus {
  wd:Q47092 # rape
  wd:Q198   # war
  wd:Q124490 # violence
  wd:Q170382 # revolver
  wd:Q1576   #cigar
  #... add yours here
  }.
  MINUS {?sense wdt:P5137 ?minus.}.
  # Exclude senses not suitable for young children:
  MINUS {
    VALUES ?filter { wd:Q8102 wd:Q545779 wd:Q1521634 wd:Q571571 wd:Q184439 }
    ?esanahia wdt:P6191 ?filter.
  }
}
GROUP BY ?l ?sense ?hitza ?ahotsak ?elhuyar ?audio

LIMIT 1

# MPs with identified mythical ancestors
SELECT ?mp ?mpLabel ?person ?personLabel ?born ?died ?typeLabel WHERE {
  ?mp p:P39 ?positionStatement .
  ?positionStatement ps:P39 wd:Q77685926 .  # this person is a member of the current parliament
  { ?mp (wdt:P25|wdt:P22)* ?person . } # mp's mother or father, or their mother or father, and so on
  filter not exists { ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 } . # the ancestor is not "a human"
  ?person wdt:P31 ?type .
  OPTIONAL { ?person wdt:P569 ?born } .
  OPTIONAL { ?person wdt:P570 ?died } .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}

query:
#List of countries by age of the head of government
#added by Jura1, rev. 2016-11-08
SELECT DISTINCT ?countryLabel ?hgovernmentLabel ?gage ?hstateLabel ?sage WHERE {
  ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078.
  FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q3024240. })
  ?country p:P6 ?statement.
  ?statement ps:P6 ?hgovernment.
  ?country wdt:P6 ?hgovernment.
  FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?statement pq:P582 ?x. })
  ?country p:P35 ?sstatement.
  ?sstatement ps:P35 ?hstate.
  ?country wdt:P35 ?hstate.
  FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?statement pq:P582 ?x. })
  ?hgovernment wdt:P569 ?dobh.
  BIND((YEAR(NOW())) - (YEAR(?dobh)) AS ?gage)
  ?hstate wdt:P569 ?dobs.
  BIND((YEAR(NOW())) - (YEAR(?dobs)) AS ?sage)
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
ORDER BY (?countryLabel)
context: List of countries by age of the head of government

# Cities of the United States between 100,000 and 600,000 inhabitants with the counties and states they are located in
SELECT DISTINCT ?city ?cityLabel ?county ?countyLabel ?state ?stateLabel ?pop ?coord
WHERE 
{
  ?city wdt:P31 wd:Q1093829 .

  ?city wdt:P1082 ?pop .
  FILTER (?pop >= 100000 && ?pop <= 600000)
  
  ?city wdt:P131 ?county .
  ?county wdt:P31/wdt:P279 wd:Q47168 .
  
  ?county wdt:P131 ?state .
  ?state wdt:P31 wd:Q35657 .

query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?person ?personLabel ?office ?officeLabel ?end1 ?start2 (FLOOR(?days/36.525)/10 AS ?gap)
WHERE {
  # Offices Held by Heads of Government
  ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078; p:P1313/ps:P1313 ?office .
  
  # People who have held the office more than once
  ?person p:P39 [ ps:P39 ?office ; pq:P582 ?end1 ] .
  ?person p:P39 [ ps:P39 ?office ; pq:P580 ?start2 ] .
  FILTER (?start2 > ?end1)
  FILTER NOT EXISTS { # but must be successive periods
    ?person p:P39 [ ps:P39 ?office ; pq:P580 ?start3 ] .
    FILTER((?start3 > ?end1) && (?start3 < ?start2))
  }

  # How long between end of one term and start of the next
  BIND (?start2 - ?end1 AS ?days)
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
ORDER BY DESC(?days)
LIMIT 10

SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?age ?end_causeLabel ?end_time ?dob WHERE {
  ?item wdt:P569 ?dob .
  ?item p:P39 ?mp_stmt .
  ?mp_stmt ps:P39 ?mp .
  ?mp_stmt pq:P582 ?end_time .
  OPTIONAL {
     VALUES ?excluded_cause {wd:Q1787171 wd:Q35855188 wd:Q30580660 wd:Q35867887 wd:Q52084147} .
    ?mp_stmt pq:P1534 ?excluded_cause .
  }
  FILTER(!bound(?excluded_cause)) .
  ?mp_stmt pq:P1534 ?end_cause .
  ?mp wdt:P279 wd:Q16707842 .
  ?mp_next_parl wdt:P155 ?mp .
  MINUS {?item wdt:P39 ?mp_next_parl} .
  BIND (((?end_time - ?dob) / 365.24) AS ?age) .
  FILTER(bound(?age)) .
  FILTER(year(?end_time) > 1899) .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
} ORDER BY ?age 
LIMIT 200

 ].
BIND(MONTH(?dob)AS ?month)
BIND(DAY(?dob)AS ?day)
BIND(IF(((?month=3)&&(?day>=21))||((?month=4)&&(?day<20)),"Aries",
IF(((?month=4)&&(?day>=20))||((?month=5)&&(?day<21)),"Taurus",
IF(((?month=5)&&(?day>=21))||((?month=6)&&(?day<21)),"Gemini",
IF(((?month=6)&&(?day>=21))||((?month=7)&&(?day<23)),"Cancer",
IF(((?month=7)&&(?day>=23))||((?month=8)&&(?day<23)),"Leo",
IF(((?month=8)&&(?day>=23))||((?month=9)&&(?day<23)),"Virgo",
IF(((?month=9)&&(?day>=23))||((?month=10)&&(?day<23)),"Libra",
IF(((?month=10)&&(?day>=23))||((?month=11)&&(?day<22)),"Scorpio",
IF(((?month=11)&&(?day>=23))||((?month=12)&&(?day<22)),"Sagittarius",
IF(((?month=12)&&(?day>=22))||((?month=1)&&(?day<20)),"Capricorn",
IF(((?month=1)&&(?day>=20))||((?month=2)&&(?day<19)),"Aquarius",
IF(((?month=2)&&(?day>=19))||((?month=3)&&(?day<21)),"Pisces",
"unknown (this should never happen)"
))))))))))))
       AS ?sign)
 SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' }
}
context: Star signs of Japanese Prime Ministers
Video game series with the longest time gap between a game and its direct sequel

query:
## Select Query was used to retrieve specific results (Country name, wiki data number, Synonyms)
SELECT ?wikidata ?wikidataLabel (?code as ?_iso3166) ?wikipedia (?wikidataAltLabel as ?alt) ?synonym ?wikidataDescription  (?wikidataLabel as ?term) { 

## Forcing particular query execution order
  hint:Query hint:optimizer "None" . 

## all ISO countries 
  ?wikidata wdt:P297 ?code.

## Optional details about the countries like links to wikipaedia pages for each country to be presented in a seperate column
  OPTIONAL { ?wikipedia schema:about ?wikidata; schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/> }
  SERVICE wikibase:label {
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".

## Selecting the prefered label 
    ?wikidata skos:altLabel ?wikidataAltLabel ; rdfs:label ?wikidataLabel; schema:description  ?wikidataDescription          
  } 

## Making sure the RGI alphabets of the flags are not rendered as flags and they appear as simple alphabets by specifying the acceptable characters. 
  BIND (REPLACE(REPLACE(?wikidataAltLabel, "(, )?[🇦-🇿]{2}", ""), "^, ", "") AS ?synonym )
}

 ORDER BY (?wikidataLabel)

query:
select (str(?decade) as ?dec) (count(distinct ?ps) as ?count) ?causeLabel   where
{
  ?mp p:P39 ?ps . ?ps ps:P39 ?term . ?term wdt:P279 wd:Q16707842 . 
  ?ps pq:P582 ?pend . filter not exists { ?mp p:P39 ?ps2 . ?ps2 ps:P39 ?term . ?ps2 pq:P580 ?pend } 
  # not new term starting same day - ie left Parliament
  ?ps pq:P1534 ?cause . 
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q741182 } # not dissolution
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q7649223 } # not suspension
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q35855188 } # tofix
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q36345696 } # tofix
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q30580660 } # tofix
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q52084147 } # tofix
  filter not exists { ?ps pq:P1534 wd:Q35867887 } # tofix
  bind(year(?pend) as ?year) . filter(?year >= 1880) . bind((floor(?year/10)*10) as ?decade) .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
} group by ?causeLabel ?decade order by ?causeLabel
#defaultView:BarChart

  ?item wdt:P509 ?causeofdeath.
  ?item wdt:P570 ?sterbedatum.

  FILTER( ?sterbedatum <= "2019-12-31T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime )

SELECT DISTINCT ?city ?cityLabel ?population ?location ?lon ?lat WHERE {
  # get cities (or classes based on city) in germany
  ?city wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q515 ;
        wdt:P17 wd:Q183 .

  ?city wdt:P1082 ?population ;
        wdt:P625 ?location .
  
  # we're only interested in cities with a population count > 50.000

}
context: Location of German cities with a population count greater than 50.000

query:
# Query to get first level administrative region of a country
SELECT DISTINCT ?region ?regionLabel ?pop ?ended
WHERE {
  # Instance of first administrative division
  ?region p:P31 ?stat.
  ?stat a wikibase:BestRank.
  FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?stat pq:P582 []}
  ?stat ps:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q10864048.
  
#  ?region wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q10864048.
  #UNION { ?city wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q515. }

  ?region wdt:P1082 ?pop.
  ?region wdt:P150 ?regionContained.
      
  # only in Germany
  ?region wdt:P17 wd:Q183.
  
  MINUS { ?region wdt:P576 ?x. } # remove region that has been disolved
  # remove region that is nowdays not a first level administrative region
  
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }
}
ORDER BY DESC(?pop)

query:
# search for artist D.K. active in 1964

# query by Jura1, 2021-01-02, suggestion by https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/User:Herzi_Pinki

SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?d1 ?d2 ?nl0 ?nl1 ?itemDescription ?sig 
WHERE
{
    ?item wdt:P569 ?d1 ; wdt:P570 ?d2 .
    hint:Prior hint:rangeSafe true .
    FILTER( ?d1 > "1880-00-00"^^xsd:dateTime &&
            ?d2 > "1964-00-00"^^xsd:dateTime &&

    ?item wdt:P735 / wdt:P1705 ?nl0 . FILTER( REGEX(?nl0, "^D" ) )
    ?item wdt:P734 / wdt:P1705 ?nl1 . FILTER( REGEX(?nl1, "^K" ) )
    ?item wdt:P106/wdt:P279* wd:Q3391743 .
     hint:Prior hint:gearing "forward".   
    OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P109 ?sig }
    SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" }
}

query:
#Ordinals in all languages/notations: 0th to 100th
#Jura1, 2021-04-06
SELECT 
  ?nv ?item ?itemLabel 
  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?l0; SEPARATOR = ", ") AS ?all) 
  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?l1; SEPARATOR = ", ") AS ?all_ad) 
  ?enl 
WHERE
{
  {
    SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?nv ?enl (STR(?lt) AS ?l0)  (STR(?ln) AS ?l1) 
    WHERE
    {
      ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q191780; wdt:P1181 ?nv . FILTER( ?nv < 101 ) 
      ?item rdfs:label ?enl.                    FILTER( LANG(?enl) = "en" )
      ?item (rdfs:label|skos:altLabel) ?lt . FILTER( STR(?lt) != STR(?enl) && !CONTAINS(?lt, str(?nv) ) )
      ?item (rdfs:label|skos:altLabel) ?ln . FILTER( STR(?ln) != STR(?enl) && CONTAINS(?ln, str(?nv) ) )
    }
    ORDER BY ?nv ?l0
  }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]". }
}
GROUP BY ?nv ?item ?itemLabel ?enl
ORDER BY ?nv

query:
#title:Places more or less on Papa Stour
#defaultView:Map
SELECT ?place ?placeLabel ?location (GROUP_CONCAT(?typeLabel_;separator="; ") as ?typeLabel) WHERE {
  hint:Query hint:optimizer "None".
  VALUES ?island {wd:Q1552121}      
  ?island wdt:P5140 ?point . 
  SERVICE wikibase:around { 
      ?place wdt:P625 ?location . 
      bd:serviceParam wikibase:center ?point . 
      bd:serviceParam wikibase:radius "10" . 
  } 
  ?place p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat .
  ?place p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLongitude ?long . 
  ?island p:P1332/psv:P1332/wikibase:geoLatitude ?north .
  ?island p:P1333/psv:P1333/wikibase:geoLatitude ?south .
  ?island p:P1334/psv:P1334/wikibase:geoLongitude ?east .
  ?island p:P1335/psv:P1335/wikibase:geoLongitude ?west .
  FILTER ( ?lat <= ?north )
  FILTER ( ?lat >= ?south )
  FILTER ( ?long <= ?east )
  FILTER ( ?long >= ?west )
  OPTIONAL { ?place wdt:P31 ?type . }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" .
                         ?place rdfs:label ?placeLabel . 
                         ?type rdfs:label ?typeLabel_ .}
} group by ?place ?placeLabel ?location

query:
#title: Count of movies with Jean-Paul Belmondo, by decade
SELECT DISTINCT
  ?decade
  (COUNT(*) as ?count)
  (SAMPLE(?item) as ?sample_movie)
  (SAMPLE(?itemLabel) as ?sample_movieLabel)
  (SAMPLE(?d) as ?sample_date)
WHERE 
{
  ?item wdt:P161 wd:Q106255; wdt:P31/wdt:P279? wd:Q11424 .
  ?item wdt:P577 ?d.

    ?item wdt:P577 ?d2.
    FILTER(?d2 < ?d)

  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],fr,cs,it,en".
                         ?item rdfs:label ?itemLabel
                         }
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade

query:
#title:Dante Alighieri: items with Q1067 as author
SELECT 
  ?item ?title (YEAR(?date) as ?year)
  ?itemLabel ?itemDescription 
  ?instanceof ?instanceofLabel 
  ?sts ?sls ?ids 
  (COALESCE(?myurl, ?iturl) as ?Wikipedia)
  ?Wikisource
WHERE
{
    ?item  wdt:P50 wd:Q1067 .
    OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P31 ?instanceof }
    OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P577 ?date }
    OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P1476 ?title }
    ?item wikibase:statements ?sts ; wikibase:sitelinks ?sls ; wikibase:identifiers ?ids 
    OPTIONAL { ?myurl schema:about ?item ; schema:isPartOf / wikibase:wikiGroup "wikipedia" ; schema:inLanguage "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]" }              
    OPTIONAL { ?iturl schema:about ?item ; schema:isPartOf <https://it.wikipedia.org/> ; schema:inLanguage "it" }                
    OPTIONAL { ?Wikisource schema:about ?item ; schema:isPartOf <https://it.wikisource.org/> ; schema:inLanguage "it" }                  
    SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],it,en". }
}
ORDER BY (!BOUND(?date)) ?date ?item

  ?item wdt:P2521 ?femaleform;
    wdt:P3321 ?maleform;
    rdfs:label ?itemLabel.
  BIND(LANG(?itemLabel) AS ?lang)
  FILTER((LANG(?itemLabel)) = "fr")
  FILTER((LANG(?femaleform)) = ?lang)
  FILTER((LANG(?maleform)) = ?lang)
  FILTER(?itemLabel = ?maleform)
  FILTER(?itemLabel != ?femaleform)
}
ORDER BY ?item
LIMIT 100

query:
#title: Liste des articles sur Blaise Pascal dans toutes les Wikipédia, classés par taille décroissante de l’article
SELECT ?sitelink ?site ?title ?taille
WHERE
{
  ?sitelink schema:about wd:Q1290.
  ?sitelink schema:isPartOf ?site.
  ?sitelink schema:isPartOf/wikibase:wikiGroup "wikipedia" .
  ?sitelink schema:name ?title.
  BIND (STRBEFORE(STRAFTER(STR(?site), "https://"), "/") AS ?endpoint)
  BIND (STR(?title) AS ?title_nolang)
  SERVICE wikibase:mwapi
  {
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:endpoint ?endpoint.
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:api "Generator".
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:generator "revisions".
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:titles ?title_nolang.
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:prop "revisions".
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:rvprop "size".
    ?size wikibase:apiOutput "revisions/rev[last()]/@size".
  }
  BIND ( xsd:integer(?size) AS ?taille )
}
ORDER BY DESC(?taille)
context: List of articles on Blaise Pascal in all Wikipedias, sorted by decreasing article size

query:
#defaultView:BarChart
SELECT ?weekday (count(distinct(?item)) as ?count) WHERE {
  wd:Q362 wdt:P580 ?od ; wdt:P582 ?do. 
  ?item wdt:P20 wd:Q160139 .
  ?item p:P570 [ps:P570 ?date ; psv:P570/wikibase:timePrecision ?precision ] filter(?precision = 11 && day(?date) != 1 && ?date > ?od && ?date < ?do ). 
  BIND( DAY( ?date ) AS ?q ) .
  BIND( MONTH( ?date ) + IF( MONTH( ?date ) < 3, 12, 0 ) AS ?m ) .
  BIND( YEAR( ?date ) - IF( MONTH( ?date ) < 3, 1, 0 ) AS ?_year ) .
  BIND( ?_year - FLOOR( ?_year / 100 ) * 100 AS ?K ) . # modulo
  BIND( FLOOR( YEAR( ?date ) / 100 ) AS ?J ) .
  BIND( ?q + FLOOR( 13 * ( ?m + 1 ) / 5 ) + ?K + FLOOR( ?K / 4 ) + FLOOR( ?J / 4 ) - 2 * ?J AS ?_h ) .
  BIND(( ?_h - FLOOR( ?_h / 7 ) * 7) as ?day) . 
  BIND(if(?day=0,"06 (Saturday)",if(?day=1,"07 (Sunday)",if(?day=2,"01 (Monday)",if(?day=3,"02 (Tuesday)",if(?day=4,"03 (Wednesday)",if(?day=5,"04 (Thursday)",if(?day=6,"05 (Friday)",""))))))) as ?weekday) . 
} group by ?weekday order by asc(?weekday)
context: Which day of the week people died on in the Mauthausen concentration camp

query:
#title:word cloud articles without statements MyLangWikipedia (switch to "Table" view to list, at left border of screen)
#defaultView:BubbleChart
SELECT
  ?word
  (COUNT(*) as ?count) 
  (URI(CONCAT("https://www.wikidata.org/w/index.php?search=inlabel%3A",?word,"%40[AUTO_LANGUAGE]+-haswbstatement%3A%2A&profile=advanced&fulltext=1&ns=1")) as ?search)
WITH
{
  SELECT ?item (CONCAT(?n, " 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 ") as ?string) 
  {
    ?item wikibase:statements 0 .
    [] schema:about ?item ; schema:name ?n ; schema:isPartOf <https://[AUTO_LANGUAGE].wikipedia.org/>
  }
  LIMIT 20000
} as %aa
WITH
{
  SELECT (str(?nv-1) as ?ord) { [] wdt:P5176 ?i ; wdt:P1181 ?nv . FILTER( ?nv < 8) } 
} as %i  
WHERE
{
  INCLUDE %i
  INCLUDE %aa
  BIND(  CONCAT("^([^ ]+ ){",?ord,"}([^ ]+) .+$") as ?re)         
  BIND(  REPLACE(?string, ?re, "$2") as ?word)
  # FILTER( ?word != "1" && )
  FILTER( strlen(?word) > 4)           
} 
GROUP BY ?word
ORDER BY DESC(?count) 
LIMIT 100
context: Wordcloud articles without statements of MyLang Wikipedia
Artworks picturing snow

query:
# (Thanks, James Heald, for the original query!)
#defaultView:Map
SELECT ?station ?line (CEIL(?depth/10)*10 as ?layer) ?coord {
  SERVICE gas:service {
       gas:program gas:gasClass "com.bigdata.rdf.graph.analytics.BFS" ; gas:in wd:Q2660080 ; gas:out ?station ; gas:out1 ?depth ; gas:out2 ?pred .
       gas:program gas:linkType wdt:P197 . }
  FILTER(?station != wd:Q2660080)
                      ?pred wdt:P625 ?cds.
                      BIND(IF(xsd:double(?depth/10) = xsd:integer(?depth/10),?cds,"") as ?coords)
  ?pred p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat1 ; p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLongitude ?lon1 .
  ?station p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat2 ; p:P625/psv:P625/wikibase:geoLongitude ?lon2 .
  values ?country { wd:Q211 wd:Q37 wd:Q191 wd:Q159 wd:Q184 } ?station wdt:P17 ?country . 
  # only Baltics or Russia or Belarus
  BIND(CONCAT('LINESTRING(', STR(?lon1), ' ', STR(?lat1), ',', STR(?lon2), ' ', STR(?lat2), ')') AS ?str) . BIND(STRDT(?str, geo:wktLiteral) AS ?line) 
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "bn,en". }
  ?station wdt:P625 ?coord.
}
context: Railway stations in the Baltics

query:
#title:World map of recent censuses known at Wikidata for each decade (select decade on the right side)
#defaultView:Map{"hide":["?loc","?locLabel","?dg","?geoshape","?decade"], "layer": "?decade"}
#from https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Property_talk:P8701 query, by Jura1, 2022-01-10
SELECT 
  ?loc ?locLabel ?geoshape ?decade 
  ?dg
  (URI(concat(str(?dg),"#P8701")) as ?available_census) 
  (CONCAT(?locLabel, ": ", GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?year; separator=", ")) as ?available_censusLabel) 
WHERE
{
  ?dg wdt:P8701 / wdt:P585 ?d . 
  FILTER( year(?d) > 1959) 
  BIND( str(YEAR(?d)) as ?year)
  BIND( CONCAT(str(FLOOR(YEAR(?d)/10)*10),"s") as ?decade) 
  ?dg wdt:P276 ?loc .
  OPTIONAL { ?loc wdt:P3896 ?geoshape }
  BIND(URI(concat(str(?dg),"#P8701")) as ?available_census) 
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}  
GROUP BY ?loc ?locLabel ?geoshape ?decade ?dg
ORDER BY DESC(?decade)
context: World map of recent censuses known at Wikidata for each decade

query:
# Parlamentari e ministri 50-80enni
SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?itemLabel (COUNT(DISTINCT ?position_statement) AS ?ministerCount)
WHERE 
{
  # Essere umano di cittadinanza italiana
  ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q5.
  ?item wdt:P27 wd:Q38.
  # Non più vecchio/a di Mattarella
  ?item wdt:P569 ?birth.
  filter (?birth > "1941-07-23"^^xsd:dateTime).
  filter (?birth < "1972-01-24"^^xsd:dateTime).
  # Non morto/a
  MINUS { ?item wdt:P570 ?death. }.
  # Ex parlamentari
  ?item wdt:P39/wdt:P361/wdt:P361 wd:Q1117578.
  MINUS {  ?item wdt:P39/wdt:P361/wdt:P361 wd:Q1117578 ; 
                 pq:P580 ?start FILTER (?start >= "2018-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime) . }
  # Ex ministri
  ?item p:P39 ?position_statement .
  ?position_statement ps:P39/wdt:P361 wd:Q3687318.
  # Ma non ministri recenti
  MINUS { ?item p:P39 ?position_recent .
         ?position_recent ps:P39/wdt:P361 wd:Q3687318.
         ?position_recent pq:P582 ?position_end
                   FILTER (?position_end >= "2014-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime). }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],it". }
}
GROUP BY ?item ?itemLabel
context: Italian parliamentarians and ministers aged between 50 and 80

query:
SELECT ?state ?stateLabel (COUNT(DISTINCT(?band)) AS ?bandCount)
  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?bandLabel; SEPARATOR=", ") AS ?bands)
WHERE {
  ?band p:P31 ?statement1.
  ?statement1 (ps:P31/(wdt:P279*)) wd:Q215380. # item is instance of musical group or subclass (ie. rock group)
  ?band p:P136 ?statement0.
  ?statement0 (ps:P136/(wdt:P279*)) wd:Q25554481. # band genre is punk music or subclass
  ?band wdt:P740 ?city. # band formed in city
  ?city wdt:P131* ?state. # county in admin body (state)
  ?state wdt:P31 wd:Q35657. # state is instance of US State
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
                         ?state rdfs:label ?stateLabel.
                          ?band rdfs:label ?bandLabel.}
  }
GROUP BY ?state ?stateLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?bandCount)

query:
# MPs with identified mythical ancestors
SELECT distinct ?person ?personLabel ?born ?died 
(group_concat(distinct ?classname;separator=", ") as ?class)  (count(distinct ?mp) as ?descendant_mp_count) WHERE {
  ?mp p:P39 ?positionStatement .
  ?positionStatement ps:P39 wd:Q77685926 .  # this person is a member of the current parliament
  { ?mp (wdt:P25|wdt:P22)* ?person . } # mp's mother or father, or their mother or father, and so on
  filter not exists { ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 } . # the ancestor is not "a human"
  ?person wdt:P31 ?type . ?type rdfs:label ?classname . filter(lang(?classname) = "en") .
  OPTIONAL { ?person wdt:P569 ?born } .
  OPTIONAL { ?person wdt:P570 ?died } .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
} group by ?person ?personLabel ?born ?died order by ?personLabel
context: MPs with identified mythical ancestors
Timeline of 1st women practising a given sports discipline

query:
#title: Age of the actress when she played "Elizabeth Bennet"
#productions of Pride and Prejudice and who played Elizabeth Bennet and what kind of thing they were
SELECT DISTINCT ?production ?productionLabel ?actressLabel ?dateBirth ?dateProduction ?age WHERE {
  ?production wdt:P144 wd:Q170583 ;  # thing based on Pride & Prejudice
              p:P161 [ ps:P161 ?actress; pq:P453 wd:Q2223341 ] . # cast member has character role Elizabeth Bennet
  ?actress wdt:P569 ?dateBirth .
  ?production wdt:P577 ?dateProduction .
  BIND ( ((?dateProduction - ?dateBirth)/365.24) AS ?age )
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
ORDER BY ?age
context: Age of the actress when she played "Elizabeth Bennet"

query:
#title: people with dates of birth and death on January 1st (day precision dates)
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?itemDescription ?born ?died
{
  ?item p:P570 [ a wikibase:BestRank; psv:P570 [ wikibase:timeValue ?born; wikibase:timePrecision 11 ]] . 
  FILTER( MONTH(?born) = 1 && DAY(?born) = 1 ) 
  ?item p:P569 [ a wikibase:BestRank; psv:P569 [ wikibase:timeValue ?died; wikibase:timePrecision 11 ]] . 
  FILTER( MONTH(?died) = 1 && DAY(?died) = 1 ) 
  ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }

query:
#title:Biggest biologists ever
#defaultView:ImageGrid
SELECT DISTINCT 
?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters 
(SAMPLE(?pic) as ?image)
WHERE 
{
  ?person wdt:P106/wdt:P279* wd:Q864503 .
  ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . 
  ?person wdt:P2048 ?height  . 
  OPTIONAL{?person wdt:P18 ?pic .} 
  ?person p:P2048 ?statement  .    
  ?statement       psv:P2048    ?valuenode .
  ?valuenode    wikibase:quantityAmount    ?value .
  ?valuenode    wikibase:quantityUnit  ?unit .
  
  ?unit p:P2370/psv:P2370 [                # conversion to SI unit
     wikibase:quantityAmount ?conversion;
     wikibase:quantityUnit wd:Q11573;      # meter
  ]
  BIND((?value * ?conversion) AS ?heigth_in_meters).
  

  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
GROUP BY ?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters 
ORDER BY DESC(?heigth_in_meters)

query:
#title: Biggest coins outside the U.S.
#defaultView:ImageGrid
SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?itemLabel ?pic ?diameter_in_cm ?country ?countryLabel ?material ?materialLabel
WHERE 
{
  ?item wdt:P279* wd:Q41207 . 
  
  ?item wdt:P18 ?pic .
  ?item wdt:P17 ?country .
  MINUS {?item wdt:P17 wd:Q30 . }
  OPTIONAL{?item wdt:P186 ?material .}

  ?item p:P2386 ?statement_P2386  .    
  ?statement_P2386       psv:P2386    ?valuenode_P2386 .
  ?valuenode_P2386    wikibase:quantityAmount     ?value_P2386 .
  ?valuenode_P2386    wikibase:quantityUnit  ?unit_P2386 .


  ?unit_P2386 p:P2370/psv:P2370 [                # conversion to SI unit
     wikibase:quantityAmount ?conversion;
     wikibase:quantityUnit wd:Q11573;      # meter
  ]
  BIND((?value_P2386 * ?conversion)* 100 AS ?diameter_in_cm).
  
  
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}

SELECT ?person ?personLabel ?spouse ?spouseLabel ?grandparent ?grandparentLabel ?linkcount WHERE {
    ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . # en människa
    ?person wdt:P26 ?spouse .
    ?person wdt:P569 ?date .
    FILTER(datatype(?date)=xsd:dateTime
           && ?date >= "1800-01-01T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
    ?person wikibase:sitelinks ?linkcount .
    ?spouse wikibase:sitelinks ?spouselinkcount .
    FILTER (?linkcount >= ?spouselinkcount) # för att inte få paren två gånger (utom när lika "kända")
    ?parent wdt:P40 ?person .
    ?grandparent wdt:P40 ?parent .
    ?spouseparent wdt:P40 ?spouse .
    ?grandparent wdt:P40 ?spouseparent .
    ?person wikibase:sitelinks ?linkcount . # hur sortera på t.ex. summa av linkcount?
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "sv,en,de,fr" }
}
GROUP BY  ?linkcount ?person ?personLabel ?spouse ?spouseLabel ?grandparent ?grandparentLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?linkcount)

query:
SELECT ?item ?title ?wd_coord ?wiki_coord ?dist
WITH
{
  SELECT DISTINCT ?item
  {
    ?item wdt:P31 / wdt:P279 * wd:Q55488 .
    ?item wdt:P17 wd:Q145 .
    FILTER STRENDS(STR(?item), "0")
  }
} AS %get_items
{
  INCLUDE %get_items
  ?item p:P625 ?s .
  ?s ps:P625 ?wd_coord .
  ?s prov:wasDerivedFrom ?ref .
  ?ref pr:P143 wd:Q328 .
  ?sitelink schema:about ?item .
  ?sitelink schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/> .
  ?sitelink schema:name ?title .
  SERVICE wikibase:mwapi
  {
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:endpoint "en.wikipedia.org" .
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:api "Generator" .
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:generator "allpages" .
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:gapfrom ?title .
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:gapto ?title .
    bd:serviceParam mwapi:prop "coordinates" .
    ?lat wikibase:apiOutput "coordinates/co/@lat" .
    ?lon wikibase:apiOutput "coordinates/co/@lon" .
  }
  BIND (STRDT(CONCAT("Point(", ?lon, " ", ?lat, ")"), geo:wktLiteral) AS ?wiki_coord)
  BIND (geof:distance(?wd_coord, ?wiki_coord) AS ?dist)
  FILTER (! BOUND(?dist) || ?dist > 0.0)
} ORDER BY DESC(?dist)

query:
#1955 Bandung Conference participants
SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?pLabel ?pDescription
                (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?cLabel ; separator="; ") AS ?country) 
                (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?bpLabel ; separator="; ") AS ?birthplace) 
                (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT YEAR(?bd) ; separator="; ") AS ?born)
                (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT YEAR(?dd) ; separator="; ") AS ?died)
                ?gLabel ?num_statements    
WHERE
{ ?p wdt:P31 wd:Q5 ;
  wdt:P1344 wd:Q208191 ;
  wikibase:statements ?num_statements .
  OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P27 ?c . ?c rdfs:label  ?cLabel .
           FILTER ( LANG ( ?cLabel ) = "en" ) } .
  OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P19 ?bp . ?bp rdfs:label  ?bpLabel .
           FILTER ( LANG ( ?bpLabel ) = "en" ) } .
  OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P569 ?bd } .
  OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P570 ?dd } .
  OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P21 ?g } .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" }
}
GROUP BY ?p ?pLabel ?pDescription ?country ?birthplace ?born ?died ?gLabel ?num_statements
ORDER BY DESC(?num_statements)

query:
# FLOSS videogames in timeline
# author: Valerio Bozzolan, contributors
# source code: https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/P39517
# license: CC0
#defaultView:Timeline

# query with label
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?image ?date
WHERE 
{
  {
    # query without labels
    SELECT ?item (SAMPLE(?image) as ?image) (MIN(?whatever_date) as ?date)
    WHERE
    {
      # item must be a videogame or any subclass of copyright license
      wd:Q7889 ^wdt:P279*/^wdt:P31 ?item.

      # item must has a license
      ?item wdt:P275 ?license.

      # the license must be a libre license
      ?libre_license ^wdt:P279*/^wdt:P31  ?license.
      VALUES ?libre_license {
        wd:Q97044024 # open source
        wd:Q3943414  # free software
        wd:Q97662661 # free license
        wd:Q196294   # open license
      }
      OPTIONAL {
        ?item wdt:P18 ?image.
      }
      # item must have a date (whatever publication date or inception date is fine)
      ?item  wdt:P577|wdt:P571 ?whatever_date.
    }
    GROUP BY ?item
  }
  # apply labels after the group by
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}

query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?human ?humanLabel ?mastodon ?url (GROUP_CONCAT(?domain_label;separator=" | ") AS ?domains)  WHERE {
  ?human wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
  ?human wdt:P4033 ?mastodon .
  ?human wdt:P106 wd:Q1650915 .
  ?human wdt:P101 ?domain .
  ?domain rdfs:label ?domain_label .
  FILTER (LANG(?domain_label) = "en")
  BIND(REPLACE(?mastodon, "@.*", "") AS ?userhandle)
  BIND(REPLACE(?mastodon, ".*@", "") AS ?host)
  BIND(URI(CONCAT("https://", ?host, "/@", ?userhandle)) AS ?url)
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
GROUP BY ?human ?humanLabel ?mastodon ?url
ORDER BY ?domains

#title:Number of Wikipedia sitelinks for Art Looting Investigation Unit Red Flag Names
SELECT ?lang (COUNT(DISTINCT ?article) AS ?count) WHERE {
  hint:Query hint:optimizer "None".

  # This hint says to search the property chain above from left to right ("forward"),
  # i.e. it is checked if each previously found value for ?article is linked to a Wikipedia.

  # articles first, and then select the intersection with the previously found values of ?article.

  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
} GROUP BY ?lang

query:
# count of games published in ROM format per platform per year, 1995-1997
#defaultView:BarChart
SELECT DISTINCT
?platformLabel
(COUNT(*) AS ?game_count) (STR(?pubYear_) AS ?pubYear) # turn back pubYear_ YEAR into STR for the bar chart x-axis to look good
WHERE { 
  ?game wdt:P31 wd:Q7889. # instance of video game
  ?game wdt:P437 wd:Q633454. # distribution format is ROM cartridge
  ?game wdt:P577 ?pubDate.
  ?game wdt:P400 ?platform.

  BIND (YEAR(?pubDate) AS ?pubYear_) # cast pubDate as YEAR for filtering
  
  FILTER (?pubYear_ >= 1995 && ?pubYear_ <= 1997)
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
GROUP BY ?pubYear_ ?platformLabel
ORDER BY ASC(?platformLabel)
context: Count of games published in ROM format per platform per year, 1995-1997

WHERE {
  ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 .
  ?country wdt:P1082 ?population .
  ?countryB wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 .
  ?countryB wdt:P1082 ?populationB .
  FILTER (?country != ?countryB && ?populationB >= ?population * 0.95 && ?populationB <= ?population * 1.05)
  ?country rdfs:label ?countryLabel . FILTER (LANG(?countryLabel) = "en") .
  ?countryB rdfs:label ?countryBLabel . FILTER (LANG(?countryBLabel) = "en") .
}
GROUP BY ?country ?countryLabel ?population
ORDER BY ?countryLabel

query:
#defaultView:Timeline
SELECT ?composer ?composerLabel ?dateOD ?placeODLabel (SAMPLE(?img) AS ?image) (COUNT(?work) as ?CW)
WHERE {
  ?work wdt:P86 ?composer .                 # wdt:P86 composer
  ?composer wdt:P570 ?dateOD ;              # wdt:P570 date of death (Monteverdi died in 1643)
            wdt:P20 ?placeOD                # wdt:P20 place of death
            FILTER(YEAR(?dateOD) > 1000 
                   && YEAR(?dateOD) < 1644) . 
  ?placeOD wdt:P17 ?country .
  # positive list is ugly, I don't know better yet.
  VALUES ?countries {
      wd:Q28 wd:Q29 wd:Q31 wd:Q34 wd:Q36 wd:Q38 wd:Q39 wd:Q40 wd:Q41 wd:Q45 wd:Q55 wd:Q142 wd:Q145 wd:Q183 wd:Q212 wd:Q213 wd:Q219 wd:Q38872
      #  Mexico https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaspar_Fernandes, currently only one of his works is registered, so having CW>1 will loose him
      wd:Q96 } .
  FILTER(?country IN (?countries)) .
  OPTIONAL { ?composer wdt:P18 ?img . }     # wdt:P18 image
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
GROUP BY ?composer ?composerLabel ?dateOD ?placeODLabel
HAVING (?CW >= 2)
LIMIT 180

query:
#defaultView:Map
SELECT distinct ?item ?itemLabel ?pobLabel (ROUND(?dist) as ?distance) ?coord ?coord2 ?line
WHERE 
{
  ?item wdt:P39 ?position.
  wd:Q112014 wdt:P2670 ?position.
  ?item p:P39 ?stat . 
  ?stat ps:P39 ?position . 
  filter not exists {?stat pq:P582 [] .}
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } 
  ?item wdt:P39 wd:Q77685926 .
  ?item wdt:P19 ?pob .
  ?pob wdt:P625 ?coord . 
  wd:Q62408 wdt:P625 ?coord2 .
  BIND(geof:distance(?coord, ?coord2) as ?dist) 
  
  ?pob p:P625 [ ps:P625 [];  psv:P625 [ wikibase:geoLongitude ?coord1lon; wikibase:geoLatitude ?coord1lat; ] ].
  wd:Q62408 p:P625 [ ps:P625 [];  psv:P625 [ wikibase:geoLongitude ?coord2lon; wikibase:geoLatitude ?coord2lat; ] ].
  BIND(CONCAT('LINESTRING (', STR(?coord1lon), ' ', STR(?coord1lat), ',', STR(?coord2lon), ' ', STR(?coord2lat), ')') AS ?str) .
  BIND(STRDT(?str, geo:wktLiteral) AS ?line)  
} order by ?distance

query:
SELECT ?univ ?univLabel ?debut ?fin ?president ?presidentLabel ?naissance ?deces ?age ?sexeLabel ?roleLabel ?motifLabel 
WHERE {
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "fr". }
  
  ?univ wdt:P31 wd:Q3551775 . # université de France
  ?univ p:P488 ?node .        # récupère tous les présidents et pas seulement le dernier
  ?node ps:P488 ?president . 
  OPTIONAL {?node pq:P1534 ?motif.}
  OPTIONAL {?node pq:P39 ?role.}
  
  OPTIONAL{?node pq:P580 ?année .} # date de début du mandat
  OPTIONAL{?node pq:P582 ?année2 .} # date de fin du mandat
  OPTIONAL{?president wdt:P569 ?année3 .} # année de naissance
  OPTIONAL{?president wdt:P570 ?année4 .} # année de décès
  OPTIONAL{?president wdt:P21 ?sexe.} # sexe du président
  
  BIND(year(?année) as ?debut) # conserve que l'année
  BIND(year(?année2) as ?fin)
  BIND(year(?année3) as ?naissance)
  BIND(year(?année4) as ?deces)
  BIND(?debut - ?naissance AS ?age) # âge en début de mandat
}

ORDER BY ?univLabel ?debut

query:
# # # generate cumulative experience for all members on a given day

SELECT DISTINCT ?electionday (sum(?experience_in_days) as ?total_experience) (count(distinct ?item) as ?mps)
((sum(?experience_in_days)/(count(distinct ?item))/365.25) as ?average_years)
where 
{  
  ?election wdt:P31 wd:Q15283424 . ?election wdt:P585 ?electionday . filter(year(?electionday) > 1918) .
  ?item p:P39 ?positionStatement . ?positionStatement ps:P39 ?term . ?term wdt:P279 wd:Q16707842 .
  ?positionStatement pq:P580 ?start . ?positionStatement pq:P2715 ?election . # find every MP returned in that election
  optional { select ?item (sum(round(?duration)) as ?experience_in_days) ?electionday
    WHERE 
     { 
       ?election wdt:P31 wd:Q15283424 . ?election wdt:P585 ?electionday . filter(year(?electionday) > 1918) . 
       ?item p:P39 ?ps . ?ps ps:P39 ?term . ?term wdt:P279 wd:Q16707842 . 
       ?ps pq:P580 ?start . ?ps pq:P582 ?end . # only looking at ended terms
       filter ( ?end < ?electionday ) . 
      BIND((?end - ?start) AS ?duration) . 
      # period for all previous terms
   } group by ?item ?electionday
 }  
  
} group by ?electionday order by ?electionday

query:
#Hip hop Map
#defaultView:Map
SELECT ?hiphopArtist ?hiphopname ?placeBirth ?placeBirthLabel ?location
WHERE
{
  ?hiphopArtist wdt:P136 wd:Q11401. #genre is hiphop
  #?hiphopArtist wdt:P106 wd:Q2252262. #occupation is rapper
  ?hiphopArtist wdt:P31 wd:Q5. # Must be a human
  ?hiphopArtist wdt:P742 ?hiphopname.
  ?hiphopArtist wdt:P19 ?placeBirth.
  #FILTER(?placeBirth = wd:Q18424) 
  ?placeBirth wdt:P625 ?location
  
                
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],mul,en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then default for all languages, then en language
}
ORDER BY ?hiphopArtistLabel
context: Hip Hop artists by place of birth

query:
#title: literary work (1700-1830) with more then 25 sitelinks
SELECT distinct ?item ?itemLabel ?itemDescription ?sitelinks ?date_written
WHERE
{
  ?item wikibase:sitelinks ?sitelinks . hint:Prior hint:rangeSafe true .
  FILTER (?sitelinks > 25 )                # Minimum sitelinks (language)
  ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q7725634.   # literary work
  ?item wdt:P577 ?date_written.     # publication date
  #?item wdt:P571 ?date_written.    # inception
  FILTER (?date_written >= "1700-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime)  # written after
  FILTER (?date_written <= "1830-12-31T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime)  # written before
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]" . }
}
order by ?date_written ?itemLabel
context: Literary work (1700-1830) with more than 25 sitelinks
What are the statistics for lexemes in language A that are derived from lexemes in language B?

query:
#defaultView:Map
SELECT ?person ?personLabel ?article ?birthplaceLabel ?coord WHERE {
  # Person is a Polish national
  ?person wdt:P27 wd:Q36.
  
  # Person has a Polish Wikipedia article
  ?article schema:about ?person;
           schema:isPartOf <https://pl.wikipedia.org/>.

  # Person has a birthplace with coordinates
  ?person wdt:P19 ?birthplace.
  ?birthplace wdt:P625 ?coord.

  # Optional: Limit to people born after 1900 (change if needed)
  ?person wdt:P569 ?birthdate.
  FILTER(YEAR(?birthdate) >= 1900)
  
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "pl". }
}
LIMIT 5000
context: Map of Birthplace of Polish Nationals, born after 1900 who have an article on Polish Wikipedia
Items with no Statement or Sitelinks
Showcase lexemes and their language/lexical category
Obscure units of measurement and where to find them

query:
#Female scientists with most number of sitelinks (but not English Wikipedia)
#Female scientists with most number of sitelinks (but not English Wikipedia)
#PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?linkcount WHERE {
    ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
    ?item wdt:P21 wd:Q6581072 .
    ?item wdt:P106 wd:Q901 .
    ?item wikibase:sitelinks ?linkcount .
  FILTER (?linkcount >= 1) . # only include items with 1 or more sitelinks
  FILTER NOT EXISTS {
    ?article schema:about ?item .
    ?article schema:inLanguage "en" .
    ?article schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/>
  }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en,de,es,ar,fr" }
}
GROUP BY ?item ?itemLabel ?linkcount
ORDER BY DESC(?linkcount)
context: Female scientists with most number of sitelinks

query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?district ?districtLabel (MAX(?population) AS ?latestPopulation) 
       ?coordinateLocation ?osmRelationId ?officialWebsite WHERE {
  ?district wdt:P31 wd:Q3539870;  # Administrative divisions of Uganda (including districts)
            p:P1082 ?populationStatement. # Population statement
  ?populationStatement ps:P1082 ?population. # Population value
  OPTIONAL { ?populationStatement pq:P585 ?date } # Population date if available
  OPTIONAL { ?district wdt:P625 ?coordinateLocation } # Coordinates
  OPTIONAL { ?district wdt:P402 ?osmRelationId } # OSM Relation ID
  OPTIONAL { ?district wdt:P856 ?officialWebsite } # Official website
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
GROUP BY ?district ?districtLabel ?coordinateLocation ?osmRelationId ?officialWebsite
ORDER BY DESC(?latestPopulation)
context: 2024 Population Census in Uganda

  For a sometimes faster alternative to FILTER, you might also look at MINUS, see [[Wikidata:SPARQL query service/queries#Excluding subsets|example]].

FILTER(condition). is a clause you can insert into your SPARQL query to filter the results. Inside the parentheses, you can put any expression of boolean type, and only those results where the expression returns true are used.

For example, to get a list of all humans born in 2015, we first get all humans with their date of birth –

– and then filter that to only return the results where the year of the date of birth is 2015. There are two ways to do that: extract the year of the date with the YEAR function, and test that it’s 2015 –

– or check that the date is between Jan. 1st (inclusive), 2015 and Jan. 1st, 2016 (exclusive):

I’d say that the first one is more straightforward, but it turns out the second one is much faster, so let’s use that:

Another possible use of FILTER is related to labels. The label service is very useful if you just want to display the label of a variable. But if you want to do stuff with the label – for example: check if it starts with “Mr. ” – you’ll find that it doesn’t work:

This query finds all instances of  and tests if their label starts with "Mr. " (STRSTARTS is short for “string starts [with]”; there’s also STRENDS and CONTAINS). The reason why this doesn’t work is that the label service adds its variables very late during query evaluation; at the point where we try to filter on ?humanLabel, the label service hasn’t created that variable yet.

Fortunately, the label service isn’t the only way to get an item’s label. Labels are also stored as regular triples, using the predicate rdfs:label. Of course, this means all labels, not just English ones; if we only want English labels, we’ll have to filter on the language of the label:

The LANG function returns the language of a monolingual string, and here we only select those labels that are in English. The full query is:

We get the label with the ?human rdfs:label ?label triple, restrict it to English labels, and then check if it starts with “Mr. ”.

One can also use FILTER with a regular expression. In the following example
